verses.verse: And I 2504 P-1NS-C Having Come 2064 V-2AAP-NSM To 4314 PREP You, 5209 P-2AP Brethren, 80 N-VPM Came 2064 V-2AAI-1S Not 3756 PRT-N ' According To 2596 PREP Excellency 5247 N-ASF Of Word 3056 N-GSM Or 2228 PRT Wisdom, 4678 N-GSF Announcing 2605 V-PAP-NSM To You 5213 P-2DP The 3588 T-ASN Testimony 3142 N-ASN 3588 T-GSM Of God. 2316 N-GSM

<WG3756> For Not <WG1063> I Decided <WG2919> <WG3588> To Know <WG1492> Anything <WG5100> Among <WG1722> You, <WG5213> <WG1487> Except <WG3361> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> And <WG2532> Him <WG5126> Crucified. <WG4717>

And <WG2532> I 1473 P-1NS In 1722 PREP Weakness 769 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ In 1722 PREP Fear 5401 N-DSM And 2532 CONJ In 1722 PREP Trembling 5156 N-DSM Much 4183 A-DSM Was 1096 V-2ADI-1S With 4314 PREP You; 5209 P-2AP

And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3056> My Word <WG3450> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG2782> My Preaching <WG3450> Was Not <WG3756> In <WG1722> Persuasive <WG3981> Human <WG442> Of Wisdom <WG4678> Words, <WG3056> ' But <WG235> In <WG1722> Demonstration <WG585> Of The Spirit <WG4151> And <WG2532> Of Power; <WG1411>
That <WG2443> <WG3588> <WG4102> Your Faith <WG5216> <WG3361> Might Not Be <WG5600> In <WG1722> Wisdom <WG4678> Of Men, <WG444> ' But <WG235> In <WG1722> Power <WG1411> Of God. <WG2316>

<WG4678> But Wisdom <WG1161> We Speak <WG2980> Among <WG1722> The <WG3588> Perfect; <WG5046> <WG4678> But Wisdom, <WG1161> Not <WG3756> <WG3588> <WG165> Of This Age, <WG5127> Nor <WG3761> Of The <WG3588> Rulers <WG758> <WG3588> <WG165> Of This Age, <WG5127> Who <WG3588> Are Coming To Naught. <WG2673>

But <WG235> We Speak <WG2980> Wisdom <WG4678> Of God <WG2316> In <WG1722> A Mystery, <WG3466> The <WG3588> Hidden Wisdom <WG613> Which <WG3739> Predetermined <WG4309> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Before <WG4253> The <WG3588> Ages <WG165> For <WG1519> <WG1391> Our Glory, <WG2257>

Which <WG3739> No One <WG3762> Of The <WG3588> Rulers <WG758> <WG3588> <WG165> Of This Age <WG5127> Has Known, <WG1097> <WG1487> For If <WG1063> They Had Known, <WG1097> <WG3756> Not <WG302> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Of The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> They Would Have Been Crucified, <WG4717>

But <WG235> According As <WG2531> It Has Been Written, <WG1125> Things Which <WG3739> Eye <WG3788> <WG3756> Saw Not, <WG1492> And <WG2532> Ear <WG3775> <WG3756> Heard Not, <WG191> And <WG2532> Into <WG1909> Heart <WG2588> Of Man <WG444> <WG3756> Came Not, <WG305> Which <WG3739> Prepared <WG2090> <WG3588> God <WG2316> For Those That <WG3588> Love <WG25> Him, <WG846>

<WG2254> But To Us <WG1161> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Revealed Them <WG601> By <WG1223> <WG3588> <WG4151> His Spirit; <WG846> <WG3588> For The <WG1063> Spirit <WG4151> All Things <WG3956> , Searches, <WG2045> Even <WG2532> The <WG3588> Depths <WG899> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>

<WG5101> For Who <WG1063> Knows <WG1492> Of Men <WG444> The Things <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Man, <WG444> <WG1487> Except <WG3361> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> <WG3588> Of Man <WG444> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Him? <WG846> So <WG3779> Also <WG2532> The Things <WG3588> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> No One <WG3762> Knows, <WG1492> <WG1487> Except <WG3361> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>

<WG2249> But We <WG1161> Not <WG3756> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Of The <WG3588> World <WG2889> Received, <WG2983> But <WG235> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Which Is <WG3588> From <WG1537> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> That <WG2443> We Might Know <WG1492> The Things <WG3588> By <WG5259> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Granted <WG5483> To Us : <WG2254>

<WG5591> But The Natural <WG1161> Man <WG444> <WG3756> Receives Not <WG1209> The Things <WG3588> Of The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> <WG3472> For Foolishness <WG1063> To Him <WG846> They Are; <WG2076> And <WG2532> <WG3756> He Cannot <WG1410> Know Them, <WG1097> Because <WG3754> Spiritually <WG4153> They Are Discerned; <WG350>
<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Spiritual <WG4152> <WG350> Discerns <WG3303> All Things, <WG3956> <WG846> But He <WG1161> ' By <WG5259> No One <WG3762> Is Discerned. <WG350>

<WG5101> For Who <WG1063> Did Know The <WG1097> Mind <WG3563> Of The Lord? <WG2962> Who <WG3739> Shall Instruct <WG4822> Him? <WG846> <WG2249> But We The <WG1161> Mind <WG3563> Of Christ <WG5547> Have. <WG2192>
